UPDATE submission_files sf, genres g, submissions s SET sf.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE g.entry_key = 'SUBMISSION' AND g.context_id = s.context_id AND s.submission_id = sf.submission_id
UPDATE submission_files SET genre_id = g.genre_id FROM genres g, submissions s WHERE g.entry_key = 'SUBMISSION' AND g.context_id = s.context_id AND s.submission_id = submission_files.submission_id

UPDATE submission_files sf, genres g, submissions s, article_galleys_migration agm SET sf.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE g.entry_key = 'STYLE' AND g.context_id = s.context_id AND s.submission_id = sf.submission_id AND sf.file_id = agm.style_file_id

UPDATE submission_files sf SET genre_id = g.genre_id FROM genres g, submissions s, article_galleys_migration agm WHERE g.entry_key = 'STYLE' AND g.context_id = s.context_id AND s.submission_id = sf.submission_id AND sf.file_id = agm.style_file_id
UPDATE submission_files sf, article_galleys_migration agm SET sf.assoc_type = 515, sf.assoc_id = agm.file_id WHERE sf.file_id = agm.style_file_id
UPDATE submission_files sf SET assoc_type = 515, assoc_id = agm.file_id FROM article_galleys_migration agm WHERE sf.file_id = agm.style_file_id

INSERT INTO plugin_settings (plugin_name, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type, context_id) VALUES ('defaultthemeplugin', 'enabled', '1', 'bool', 0)
INSERT INTO plugin_settings (plugin_name, setting_name, setting_value, setting_type, context_id) SELECT 'defaultthemeplugin', 'enabled', '1', 'bool', journal_id FROM journals
INSERT INTO site_settings (setting_name, setting_value) VALUES ('themePluginPath', 'default')
INSERT INTO journal_settings (setting_name, setting_value, journal_id) SELECT 'themePluginPath', 'default', journal_id FROM journals
INSERT INTO journal_settings (setting_name, setting_value, journal_id) SELECT 'defaultReviewMode', 'default', journal_id FROM journals
UPDATE event_log SET message='submission.event.submissionSubmitted' WHERE message='log.author.submitted'
UPDATE submissions SET stage_id=3 WHERE submission_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT submission_id FROM review_assignments)
UPDATE submissions SET stage_id=3 WHERE stage_id = 1 AND submission_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT submission_id FROM review_rounds)

UPDATE submissions SET stage_id=4 WHERE submission_id IN (SELECT e1.submission_id FROM edit_decisions e1 LEFT JOIN edit_decisions e2 ON (e2.edit_decision_id > e1.edit_decision_id AND e2.submission_id = e1.submission_id) WHERE e2.edit_decision_id IS NULL AND e1.decision = 1)
UPDATE review_rounds SET stage_id=3
UPDATE review_assignments SET stage_id=3
UPDATE review_assignments ra, review_rounds rr SET ra.review_round_id = rr.review_round_id WHERE ra.submission_id = rr.submission_id AND ra.round = rr.round
UPDATE review_assignments SET review_round_id=rr.review_round_id FROM review_rounds rr WHERE rr.round = review_assignments.round AND rr.submission_id = review_assignments.submission_id

INSERT INTO review_round_files (submission_id, review_round_id, stage_id, file_id, revision) SELECT afm.article_id, rr.review_round_id, 3, afm.file_id, afm.revision FROM article_files_migration afm, articles_migration am, review_rounds rr WHERE am.review_file_id = afm.file_id AND rr.submission_id = afm.article_id AND rr.round = afm.round

INSERT INTO review_round_files (submission_id, review_round_id, stage_id, file_id, revision) SELECT afm.article_id, rr.review_round_id, 3, afm.file_id, afm.revision FROM article_files_migration afm, articles_migration am, review_rounds rr WHERE am.revised_file_id = afm.file_id AND rr.submission_id = afm.article_id AND rr.round = afm.round

INSERT INTO review_files (review_id, file_id) SELECT DISTINCT ra.review_id, afm.file_id FROM article_files_migration afm, articles_migration am, review_assignments ra WHERE ra.submission_id = am.article_id AND am.review_file_id = afm.file_id
UPDATE submission_files sf, articles_migration am SET sf.file_stage=2 WHERE am.submission_file_id=sf.file_id
UPDATE submission_files SET file_stage=2 FROM articles_migration am WHERE am.submission_file_id=submission_files.file_id
UPDATE submission_files sf, articles_migration am SET sf.file_stage=4 WHERE am.review_file_id=sf.file_id
UPDATE submission_files SET file_stage=4 FROM articles_migration am WHERE am.review_file_id=submission_files.file_id
UPDATE submission_files sf, articles_migration am SET sf.file_stage=15 WHERE am.revised_file_id=sf.file_id
UPDATE submission_files SET file_stage=15 FROM articles_migration am WHERE am.revised_file_id=submission_files.file_id
UPDATE submission_files sf, submission_galleys sg SET sf.file_stage=10 WHERE sg.file_id=sf.file_id
UPDATE submission_files SET file_stage=10 FROM submission_galleys sg WHERE sg.file_id=submission_files.file_id
UPDATE submission_files sf, article_galleys_migration agm SET sf.file_stage=17 WHERE agm.style_file_id=sf.file_id
UPDATE submission_files SET file_stage=17 FROM article_galleys_migration agm WHERE agm.style_file_id=submission_files.file_id
DELETE FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE class_name = 'classes.tasks.OpenAccessNotification'
DELETE FROM scheduled_tasks WHERE class_name = 'classes.tasks.SubscriptionExpiryReminder'

DELETE FROM filter_groups WHERE symbolic IN ('citation=>nlm30', 'isbn=>nlm30-element-citation', 'nlm30-article-xml=>nlm23-article-xml', 'nlm30-element-citation=>isbn', 'nlm30-element-citation=>nlm30-element-citation', 'nlm30-element-citation=>nlm30-xml', 'nlm30-element-citation=>plaintext', 'nlm30=>citation', 'plaintext=>nlm30-element-citation', 'submission=>nlm23-article-xml', 'submission=>nlm30-article-xml', 'submission=>reference-list')
